thread.title: TV show ratings: Grey's Anatomy and Scandal surge on Thursday - Grey's Anatomy US TV
thread.title_full: TV show ratings: Grey's Anatomy and Scandal surge on Thursday - Grey's Anatomy News - US TV - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: TV show ratings: Grey's Anatomy and Scandal surge on Thursday - Grey's Anatomy US TV
text: ABC's Thank God It's Thursday lineup had a strong night on October 22, according to Nielsen figures.Grey's Anatomy reached its highest figure since its season premiere with 2.4 (8.96m) at 8pm, while Scandal rose to 2.5 (8.28m) at 9pm and How to Get Away with Murder hit 2.1 (6.95m) at 10pm. Â© ABC / Jordin Althaus Fox's Bones garnered 1.2 (6.06m) at 8pm, before Sleepy Hollow matched last week's score of 0.8 (2.89m) at 9pm.The Vampire Diaries and The Originals both fell one-tenth of a point, generating 0.5 (1.20m) at 8pm and 0.4 (0.95m) at 9pm on The CW.NBC dramas Heroes Reborn took 1.1 (3.80m) at 8pm, The Blacklist pulled in 1.4 (6.68m) at 9pm and The Player earned 0.8 (4.15m) at 10pm.CBS won the key 18-49 demographic on Thursday with 5.4.Thursday Night Football soared to 5.9 (17.12m) at 8.30pm on CBS.
